description.value: Your weapon whirls and darts, striking foes whenever the slightest opening or moment of weakness presents itself. You can use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Dueling Riposte] even if you aren't benefiting from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Dueling Parry (Fighter)]{Dueling Parry}. At the start of each of your turns, you gain an additional reaction that you can use only to make a Dueling Riposte.
